Par ab tu badal gya h re, dasse lne laga hğŸ˜Š, ab tu woh kusagra nhi rha jo m samajta tha. All the best for your future aur is chote aadmi ko bhul na jnağŸ¤

text:

text:
Meena boyğŸ¤ŸğŸ¼
Pehla parichay tujse L20 m hua tha LIF aur PHY ki class m Air Hockey khelte the. Baki sab m toh hum sath m hage the par TA m toh kya chhapu tha yaar tu. Phir toh kya hi batao, ek saal tune mujhe apne room-mate banne ka mouka diya uske liye dhanyawad. Delhi-Agra wali trip, Bithoor Ghat ki cycle trip sab kafi memorable rhe. Sath m cricket dekhne ka aur Tennis dekhne ka bhi kya anand tha, aur Djokovic ki bitching karne m kya maza ata tha nağŸ˜…. Aur insan chahe tu thoda ghadhağŸ¦§ h par teri movies ka taste toh lajawaab hğŸ™Œ. Aise hi movies aur shows ki list bhej dia kar mujhe. Woh aadhi raat ko jo light se M bnaya tha woh yaad h na? Milte h jaldi
tera bhai,
Maloo
